§ 6246. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary such sums as are necessary to carry out this part and part D, to remain available until expended. (Pub. L. 94–163, title I, § 166, as added Pub. L. 109–58, title III, § 301(a)(1), Aug. 8, 2005, 119 Stat. 683.)
